main.description: Resolution of an appeal - the decision made by the reviewing authority.

appeal.description: AT URI of the appeal being resolved

modAction.description: AT URI of the original modAction. Optional but recommended for query efficiency - can be derived from appeal but explicit here enables direct indexing of all resolutions for a given action.

resolverDid.description: DID of the person or entity resolving the appeal

resolverAuthority.description: The authority under which this resolution is made

modifications.description: If outcome is 'modified', what changes are being made

remandInstructions.description: If outcome is 'remanded', instructions for reconsideration

finalDecision.description: Whether this resolution is final or can be further appealed
